spec_data.Name: rubygem-colorator
spec_data.Description:
Colorize your text in the terminal.  There are a bunch of gems that
provide functionality like this, but none have as simple an API as
this.  Just call "string".color and your text will be colorized.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 11:03:34 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Colorize your text in the terminal
